prompts: Create a mystical fox-like Pokemon with elegant tails and a glowing aura.
I want a fire-type creature that has a majestic appearance and a fierce personality.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies elegance and grace, featuring multiple flowing tails.
Make a mythical fox Pokemon that roams the mountains with a fiery spirit.
Imagine a Pokemon with shimmering fur and a magical presence in the forest.
Design a fox-like Pokemon with beautiful tails that can control flames.
Show me a creature with a cunning look and a striking fiery color scheme.
